Title: Big Deal on Madonna Street
Writer: Agenore Incrocci, Furio Scarpelli, Suso Cecchi D'Amico
Actors: Vittorio Gassman, Marcello Mastroianni, Renato Salvatori
Plot: A motley quintet of inept small-time thieves attempt the burglary of a local pawnshop in this Italian farce.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 4 wins & 5 nominations total
